data.title: Household Services V2
data.description: Created a full-stack service booking platform with admin controls and responsive UI.
data.about: This is a webapp designed to help people search for services. Users are monitored by the admin through an admin panel. Integrated Celery + Redis for background jobs; designed flow using Figma and Bootstrap.
process: Integrated Celery and Redis for background jobs

data.title: IITM Resources Hub
data.description: Built a student-focused resource-sharing platform with authentication and real-time updates.
data.about: A platform for IITM students to share and access resources. Leveraged AI tools to improve UI/UX and optimize development time. Gained 40+ users and continues to be updated monthly.
process: Implemented authentication and real-time updates with Firebase
Used Tailwind CSS for responsive design
Integrated AI tools for UI/UX improvement

data.title: Sponsorship Platform
data.description: Developed a platform connecting influencers with sponsors, focusing on simplicity and visualizations.
data.about: A web platform to connect influencers and sponsors. Implemented charting via Matplotlib and refined backend models to overcome real-time issues.

data.title: 2D Games Portfolio
data.description: Built interactive games including Infinite Runner, Ping Pong, and Maze Beater.
data.about: A collection of interactive 2D games built in JavaScript, strengthening understanding of algorithms, animation, and UI logic.
